attributes.title: RWBY: Fairy Tales | Official Trailer
attributes.caption: See the stories that shaped the world of Remnant. RWBY Fairy Tales is a new RWBY mini series from Rooster Teeth that brings Remnant's most famous fairy tales to life like never before.
attributes.description: See the stories that shaped the world of Remnant. RWBY Fairy Tales is a new RWBY mini series from Rooster Teeth that brings Remnant's most famous fairy tales to life like never before. Catch a new legend every week, starting in October. Join FIRST to watch episodes early.
attributes.display_title: S1:E0 - RWBY: Fairy Tales | Official Trailer

attributes.title: The Grimm Child
attributes.caption: Grimm are walking horrors that roam the wilderness... but there are some that bring the terror closer to home.
attributes.description: Grimm are walking horrors that roam the wilderness... but there are some that bring the terror closer to home.

attributes.title: The Hunter's Children
attributes.caption: A lone hunter protects a swampy village until disaster strikes. Will his children pick up the mantle?
attributes.description: A lone hunter protects a swampy village until disaster strikes. Will his children pick up the mantle?

attributes.title: The Shallow Sea
attributes.caption: Ozpin recounts two distinct origin myths regarding the Faunus.
attributes.description: Ozpin recounts two distinct origin myths regarding the Faunus.

attributes.title: The Indecisive King
attributes.caption: A kingly gift turns out to be more than it seems.
attributes.description: A kingly gift turns out to be more than it seems.

attributes.title: The Girl In The Tower
attributes.caption: Not every story has a "happily ever after."
attributes.description: Not every story has a "happily ever after."
attributes.display_title: S1:E5 - The Girl In The Tower

attributes.title: The Warrior In The Woods
attributes.caption: A young boy meets a mysterious warrior protecting his village from afar.
attributes.description: A young boy meets a mysterious warrior protecting his village from afar.
attributes.display_title: S1:E6 - The Warrior In The Woods
